headline: PTC Announces CFO Transition
summary: PTC (NASDAQ: PTC) today announced that Jennifer DiRico has been appointed Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, effective January 1, 2026. DiRico will report to President and Chief Executive Officer Neil Barua and lead the Company's global finance organization. DiRico succeeds Kristian Talvitie, who will continue to serve as CFO through December 31, 2025. DiRico's appointment is the culmination of a thorough executive search process.
